'''''The Stellar Moments''''' is the first character [[soundtrack]] album for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

It features a total of 17 tracks composed by [[w:c:mihoyo:Chen Zhiyi|Yu-Peng Chen]] and Dimeng Yuan of [[HOYO-MiX]], all original compositions for the following characters: [[Albedo]], [[Diona]], [[Fischl]], [[Ganyu]], [[Keqing]], [[Klee]], [[Mona]], [[Qiqi]], [[Tartaglia]], [[Venti]], [[Xiangling]], [[Xinyan]], and [[Zhongli]].

The album was first announced on January 22, 2021, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 1.3]]. The tracklist was announced on February 2 and the album was later released on February 4.<ref>Bilibili: [https://t.bilibili.com/487150008356867940 {{zh|「《原神》首张角色主题OST即将上线 」}}]</ref>
